frequency: a number of times per day equal to your level
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Envenom Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=1057) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
a number of times per day equal to your level

**Prerequisites**
[Sharp Fangs](/Feats.aspx?ID=1055)

</column>

---

You envenom your fangs. If the next fangs Strike you make before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 1d6 poison damage. On a critical failure, the poison is wasted as normal.
name: Envenom Fangs

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Envenom Fangs Single Action Source Character Guide pg. 59 2.0 Frequency a number of times per day equal to your level Prerequisites Sharp Fangs --- You envenom your fangs. If the next fangs Strike you make before the end of your next turn hits and deals damage, the Strike deals an additional 1d6 poison damage. On a critical failure, the poison is wasted as normal.
